entry.title: 150W LED Pole Light With Photocell ; 5700K ; Universal Mount ; Silver ; AC100-277V
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 261.28

This pole light by LEDMyplace can easily replace the traditional metal-halide pole light to provide you with 75% savings in energy. The 150W LED pole light being available as slim and sleek, in silver color, is designed to increase the safety and security in any outdoor environment. Easy to install, this LED pole light fixture comes with a photocell to provide you with additional energy-savings. A beam angle of 150*85 degree. As an IP65 rated product, this can be used in any damp location. As UL, and DLC certified product, the product is safe for use and makes you eligible for certain rebates and incentives. You have 5 years of hassle-free manufacturer’s warranty on this product.

entry.title: 450W Outdoor LED Parking Lot Lighting With Photocell, 5700K, AC100-277V, Universal Mount Bronze, With 20KV Surge Protector
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 944.58

Our 450W LED Shoebox lights will illuminate your outdoors with energy-efficient lighting technology. With the ability to illuminate the area with a lumen efficacy of 135 lumens per watt, this LED Pole light fixture operates on an input of 100-277 volt AC supply. Since the LED Pole light features a universal mount design, you can install it on various surfaces without compromising the aesthetics. LED Parking Lot lights are also available with motion sensors and photocells that add to energy consumption sustainability. Photocells are commonly known as LED Dusk to Dawn lights and are a popular outdoor lighting choice. This lighting fixture comes with an IP65 rating, that ensures resistivity to water and dust. The LED Pole light comes with premium-quality surface-mounted (SMD) LED chips rated for 50,000 operational hours. An aluminum alloy housing provides excellent heat sinking and sturdiness so that you can rely on this fixture for daily outdoor lighting needs. Enjoy this aesthetically pleasing LED shoebox light that comes with a warranty of five years.

An aluminum alloy housing provides excellent heat sinking and sturdiness, so you can rely on this fixture for daily outdoor lighting needs. This lighting fixture comes with an IP65 rating, so you can be sure of electrical safety in wet outdoor environments. The pole light comes with premium-quality surface-mounted (SMD) LED chips rated for 50,000 operational hours. It also offers a 5-year warranty. Thus, you can be sure that it will last for years to come!

entry.summary:

Dedicatedly designed to increase safety and security, these LED Pole Lights are the perfect illumination for your outdoor spaces. The most suitable places to install these LED Area Lights are building entrances, parking lots, parkways, streets, gardens, hotel walkways, and other outdoor spaces. Pole lights of 240 Watt replace metal halide bulbs of 840 Watt and deliver superior lumen output of 34000 lumens and a CCT of 5700K. These high-voltage pole lights are a durable and long-lasting lighting fixture. Tested to last around 50,000 hours. These LED Pole Lights have a robust build and IP65 certification, proving the fixture to be splash and dirt proof. This pole light fixture is photocell compatible (dusk to dawn sensors) and can help you regulate energy usage by automating the ON/ OFF process.
